Description: Welcome home to this wonderful 1BR apartment in Brighton. Minutes from public transportation via MBTA Green Line off of Commonwealth Ave. This apartment features hardwood flooring as you enter and extends throughout the living area and bedroom. Laundry located in building. Parking for rent, outdoor. Cat Friendly! Rent includes heat and hot water. 50% Brokers Fee No Security Deposit. Available 9/1/23! Tram: B Chiswick Road (0.06 mi) Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.21 mi) Bus: 65 Washington St @ Euston St (0.42 mi) Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.44 mi) Tram: C Cleveland Circle (0.26 mi) Tram: D Reservoir (0.34 mi)
